content: DBS Woman's World Card earns 4 miles per dollar on online shopping (S$1,000 cap/month). Base: 0.4 mpd local. Overseas: 1.2 mpd. Online category includes: Amazon, Shopee, Lazada, Netflix, Google One, Apple Store subscriptions.

DBS WWBC: Transaction date basis for cap enforcement. Bonus points post following month; base points post immediately. Monthly reset: calendar month (1st to last day). Rounding: S$5 blocks with minimal flexibility.
DBS WWBC points expire 1 year from earning date. Strict expiry policy: no grace period. Transfer to KrisFlyer: 2 DBS Points = 1 mile (fee S$27.25 per transfer). Auto-enrollment: S$43.60/year.

DBS WWBC excludes: NETS, 0% instalment plans (EPP), SmartPay, personal loans, balance transfers, cash advances, fees, interest, charges, reversals, top-ups, payment service providers, prepaid accounts, government payments (MCC 9399), utilities (MCC 4900), insurance (MCC 6300/5960).

DBS WWBC + Kris+: Excellent pairing. Kris+ payments code as online (MCC-agnostic), so DBS earns 4 mpd on all Kris+ transactions. Stacks with in-app Kris+ bonuses. Recommended for dining, retail through Kris+.
DBS WWBC + Amaze: NOT compatible. DBS excludes AMAZE* transactions from rewards from Dec 2025. Do not link.

DBS WWBC + Atome: Excellent pairing. Atome forces all payments to MCC 5999 (online), so DBS earns 4 mpd on Atome BNPL. Manually trigger 2nd/3rd instalments to avoid 'recurring' classification blocking bonuses.

Citi Rewards MC earns 4 mpd (10X points) on online shopping and department stores (MCCs 5311, 5612, 5621, 5631, 5641, 5651, 5661, 5691, 5699), capped at S$1,000/month. Excludes: airlines (MCC 4511), hotels (MCC 7011), travel agencies (MCC 4722), Klook, Pelago, OTAs. All other: 0.4 mpd base.

Citi Rewards qualifies on: 5311 (department stores - Lazada, Taobao), 5399 (general merchandise - Shopee, Qoo10), 5999 (specialty retail - Amazon.sg, Atome), 5612-5699 (clothing stores - Zara, Uniqlo, Bershka, Forever21), 5641 (babies/infants), 5611 (menswear). Rounds at S$1 (favorable).
Citi Rewards: POSTING DATE basis. Both base (1X) and bonus (9X) points post immediately when transaction posts (posting date, NOT transaction date). Posting date typically 1-3 days after transaction.

Citi Rewards points expire in 5-year cycles plus 3-month grace. ALL points in a cycle expire together (not rolling). Cycle resets on card approval/renewal anniversary. CRITICAL: Transfer all points before grace period ends or lose entire cycle. Example: If approved Jan 1, 2020, all points expire Mar 31, 2025 + 3mo grace = Jun 30, 2025.

Citi Rewards excludes: travel MCCs (4511 airlines, 4722 agencies, 7011 hotels, 4512 car rental), OTAs/Klook/Pelago, EPP (0% instalments), Quick Cash/FlexiBill, balance transfers, cash advances, quasi-cash (6051), annual fees, interest charges, refunded/disputed, bill payments via card, service fees, taxes.

Citi Rewards MC + Amaze: BEST pairing for miles. Earns 4 mpd on in-person dining (5812, 5814), groceries (5411), petrol (5542), retail with Amaze. FCY: 4 mpd + ~2% FX spread (vs 3.25% issuer FX) = 1% savings. SGD: 1% Amaze fee from 10 Mar 2025 (min S$0.50). Net: Amaze worthwhile for FCY and transactions >S$50.

Citi Rewards + Kris+: PROBLEMATIC. Citi excludes in-app mobile payments (Apple Pay, Google Pay) from 4 mpd. Kris+ requires Apple/Google Pay, so Citi earns 0.4 mpd naked. Workaround: Citi + Amaze + Kris+ earns 4 mpd (1% Amaze fee applied). Only viable if using Amaze linking.

Citi Rewards MC + Atome: Excellent. Atome codes as MCC 5999, which qualifies for Citi's 4 mpd online bonus. Also earns Atome+ points (1 pt/S$2) convertible to miles. Manual instalment payment recommended.

Maybank XL earns 4 mpd on: Dining (MCCs 5811, 5812, 5814, 5462), Shopping (5311, 5399, 5611-5699), Travel (4511, 4722, 7011, 7033), Entertainment (7832, 7841, 7922), FCY (all overseas/online FCY). Capped S$1,000/month. REQUIRES S$500 minimum monthly spend to unlock 4 mpd; without, earns 0.4 mpd.

Maybank XL bonuses on: 5811 (caterers), 5812 (restaurants), 5814 (fast food), 5462 (bakeries), 5311 (dept stores - Lazada), 5399 (general merchandise - Shopee), 5611-5699 (clothing), 4511 (airlines), 4722 (travel agencies), 7011 (hotels), 7033 (camping/caravans), 7832 (ticketing), 7841 (ticketing/lottery), 7922 (cinemas), plus all FCY online/overseas.

Maybank XL TREATS Points: Default 1-year expiry from earning date. Can join Maybank Rewards Infinite Programme to make points non-expiring (never expire thereafter). Points convertible to KrisFlyer at 2.5 Maybank Treats = 1 KrisFlyer mile. Transfer fee S$27.25. Min/Max transfer: 12,500-25,000 points per transaction.

Maybank XL minimum spend S$500/month is REQUIRED to unlock 4 mpd bonus rates across all categories. If monthly spend <S$500, only base 0.4 mpd applies to all categories (no bonus). Minimum resets each calendar month.

Maybank XL excludes: NETS, instalments/EPP, SmartPay, personal loans, balance transfers, cash advances, quasi-cash (6051), annual fees, interest, charges, reversals, top-ups, bill payments, prepaid, utilities (4900), insurance (6300/5960), government (9399).

Maybank XL MC + Amaze: Excellent secondary pairing (after Citi Rewards MC). Earns 4 mpd on dining/shopping/retail MCCs when linked to Amaze. FCY spread benefit: ~2% with Amaze vs 3.25% direct. SGD: 1% Amaze fee.

Maybank XL + Kris+: Good pairing. Kris+ retains merchant MCC, so Maybank XL earns 4 mpd if MCC is dining/shopping/entertainment/travel. Not all Kris+ merchants trigger 4 mpd (depends on their underlying MCC).
Maybank XL + Atome: Good pairing. Atome codes MCC 5999, which falls into Maybank's Shopping category earning 4 mpd. Requires S$500 monthly min spend to unlock 4 mpd.

HSBC Revolution earns 4 mpd on online shopping and contactless payments, capped S$1,000/month. Includes: online retailers (5311, 5399, 5999), contactless retail (dining 5812/5814, groceries 5411, petrol 5542), Grab, food delivery, streaming. All other: 0.4 mpd. No minimum spend required.

HSBC Revolution qualifies on: 5311 (dept stores), 5399 (general merchandise), 5999 (specialty retail), 5411 (groceries), 5812/5814 (dining/fast food), 5542 (petrol/fuel), 7832/7841 (ticketing/entertainment), 7922 (cinemas), 4111 (transport per June 2025 update), plus contactless payment at most merchants.

HSBC Revolution: 30,000 HSBC Reward Points = 10,000 KrisFlyer miles (effective 3.33 mpd). Worse ratio than cards like DBS WWBC (2:1). However, 20+ airline transfer partners available (Cathay Pacific, ANA, Qatar, Avios, SilkAir, etc.). No transfer fee. Points valid 37 months.

HSBC Revolution: NO ANNUAL FEE (key advantage). Points expire after 37 months (not rolling; strict expiry after 37mo). Great as backup/overflow card for online/contactless after maxing 4 mpd capped cards.
HSBC Revolution + Kris+: Excellent. Treats Kris+ as contactless payment, earning 4 mpd on all Kris+ transactions regardless of merchant MCC. Good for consistent earning across all Kris+ merchants.
HSBC Revolution + Atome: Good. Atome MCC 5999 is explicitly in HSBC's eligible online/retail list, earning 4 mpd within monthly cap.

UOB Lady's Solitaire earns 10 mpd on any 2 CHOSEN categories (changeable quarterly), capped S$1,500/month combined. Categories: Beauty & Wellness (5912 pharmacies, spas, salons, cosmetics), Fashion (5621, 5631, 5691 clothing, shoes, accessories), Dining (5811, 5812, 5814), Family (5411 supermarkets, 5641 children's wear), Travel (4511, 7011, 7033 flights/hotels/duty-free), Transport (4111, 4121, 5542 public transit/taxi/petrol), Entertainment (5813, 7832, 7841 bars/clubs/cinemas). Base: 0.4 mpd.

UOB Lady's Solitaire quarterly strategy: Q1 (Jan-Mar): Dining + Family; Q2 (Apr-Jun): Fashion + Travel; Q3 (Jul-Sep): Beauty + Entertainment; Q4 (Oct-Dec): Transport + Shopping. Switch categories 2 weeks before quarter end to maximize. S$1,500 monthly cap allows ~1 high-value purchase per category.

Lady's Solitaire MCCs: 5912 (pharmacies/beauty), 5621/5631/5691 (clothing), 5811/5812/5814 (dining), 5641 (children's), 5411 (groceries), 4511/7011 (airlines/hotels), 4111/4121 (transit), 5542 (petrol), 5813/7832/7841 (entertainment). Only chosen 2 categories earn 10 mpd; others 0.4 mpd.

UOB Lady's Solitaire: Earns UNI$ (UOB rewards). 1 UNI$ = 2 KrisFlyer miles. Transfer fee S$25 per redemption. Conversion flexible to KrisFlyer, Asia Miles. Additional bonus: Link with UOB Lady's Savings Account for up to 15X bonus UNI$ on selected spending.
Lady's Solitaire + Kris+: Excellent if MCC matches chosen categories. If Kris+ merchant has dining MCC (5812) and Dining is chosen category, earns 10 mpd. Otherwise earns 0.4 mpd base.
Lady's Solitaire + Amaze: NOT compatible. UOB excludes AMAZE* transactions from UNI$ rewards from Oct 1, 2024. Do not link.

UOB PPV earns 4 mpd on TWO split categories (from Oct 1, 2025): Category 1 - Mobile Contactless (S$600/month cap): Google Pay, Apple Pay, Samsung Pay at dining/retail/supermarkets/entertainment; Category 2 - Online Retail + SimplyGo (S$600/month cap): MCCs 5311-5699, 5811-5814, 7278/7832/7841, 31500 (SimplyGo MRT/bus new from Aug 2025). Base: 0.4 mpd. No minimum spend.

UOB PPV online category MCCs: 5262-5699 (retail/dept stores), 5811-5814 (dining), 5333/5411 (supermarkets), 7278/7832/7841 (ticketing), 31500 (SimplyGo/public transport). Mobile contactless: any merchant processed via Apple/Google/Samsung Pay at eligible merchants.

UOB PPV (Oct 1, 2025 update): TWO separate category caps, each S$600/month = total S$1,200/month max for 4 mpd. Previous (pre-Oct 2025) had combined caps. Split enforces discipline: can't max one category and carry to other.
UOB PPV: Earns UNI$ (convertible to KrisFlyer at 1 UNI$ = 2 miles). Transfer fee S$25 per redemption. No minimum spend required for 4 mpd (advantage vs other UOB cards).
UOB PPV + Kris+: Good pairing. Treats Kris+ as mobile contactless payment, earning 4 mpd within S$600 Category 1 cap.
UOB PPV + Amaze: NOT compatible. UOB card (Visa) cannot be linked to Amaze (Mastercard-only). Also excluded from UNI$ from Oct 2024 even if linked.

UOB Visa Signature earns 4 mpd on TWO categories with separate minimums and caps: Category 1 - Overseas FCY (S$1,000 min/month, S$1,200 cap): all foreign currency transactions; Category 2 - SGD Contactless (S$1,000 min/month, S$1,200 cap): includes SimplyGo (4111), petrol (5542), contactless payments. Base: 0.4 mpd. Rounding: down to S$5.

UOB Visa Signature FCY category: all foreign currency transactions globally. SGD Contactless category: 4111 (SimplyGo from Jul 2025), 5542 (petrol - Shell, Esso), plus contactless retail/dining with Apple/Google Pay in SGD. Rounding: transactions rounded DOWN to nearest S$5 for BOTH base and bonus calculations.

UOB Visa Signature: ROUNDED DOWN to nearest S$5 for both base (0.4 mpd) and bonus (4 mpd) UNI$ calculation. Aggregates all transactions when computing bonus (minimal rounding loss, unlike per-transaction rounding). Example: S$5,234 FCY spend = 5,230 rounded = 20,920 base UNI$ (5,230 / 0.25) + 209,200 bonus UNI$ (5,230 × 40).

UOB Visa Signature requires S$1,000 minimum in EACH category per month to unlock 4 mpd for that category. If FCY <S$1,000 or SGD Contactless <S$1,000, that category earns base 0.4 mpd only. Minimums reset each calendar month.

UOB Visa Signature: SimplyGo (MRT/Bus ABT) added to 'Contactless Transactions' category from July 1, 2025. Daily SimplyGo charges count toward S$1,000 SGD Contactless minimum and S$1,200 cap. This retroactive applies to existing cardholders from September 2025 statement onwards.
UOB Visa Signature + Kris+: Moderate pairing. Kris+ doesn't consistently trigger 4 mpd bonus because Kris+ isn't always categorized as contactless. Often earns 0.4 mpd base.
UOB Visa Signature + Amaze: NOT compatible. Visa card cannot link to Amaze (Mastercard-only). Also excluded from UNI$ from Oct 2024.

KrisFlyer UOB earns: 3 mpd on SIA/Scoot/KrisShop/Kris+/Pelago (uncapped, direct credit to KrisFlyer), 2.4 mpd on Dining/Food delivery/Online shopping/Online travel/Transport (requires S$1,000 annual SIA Group min spend to unlock), 1.2 mpd on all other transactions. Miles credited directly (no transfer fee). Automatic monthly posting (first 7 working days).

KrisFlyer UOB SIA uncapped: all Singapore Airlines/Scoot/KrisShop transactions. Dining (5811-5814), Food delivery (5499), Online shopping (5311, 5399, 5999), Online travel (4511 via Kris+ booking), Transport (4111 SimplyGo, 4121 taxi). All earn at bonus rates if S$1,000 annual SIA min met.

KrisFlyer UOB: Direct crediting of miles to linked KrisFlyer account. No transfer fee (unlike points-based cards). Minimum S$5 per transaction to earn miles (auto-rounded to S$5). Bonus cap: 5% of monthly average balance in KrisFlyer UOB Account (if using account for deposit bonus). Accelerated Miles take 2 months to post after membership year starts.
KrisFlyer UOB + Kris+: Excellent for uncapped SIA earning. Kris+ SIA/Scoot merchants earn 3 mpd base + in-app Kris+ bonus miles (stacking). Best for consistent, unlimited earning on SIA transactions.

AMEX KF Ascend earns: 2 mpd on SIA/Scoot/KrisShop (uncapped, direct credit to KrisFlyer), 3.2 mpd on Grab rides (capped S$200/month = ~S$640 bonus miles), 1.2 mpd on overseas/all other. Direct crediting to KrisFlyer (no transfer fee). High annual fee vs lower earn rates.

AMEX KF Ascend: Recent nerfs (Nov 2024): Removed lounge vouchers, reduced earn rates, hiked annual fee. Now significantly less attractive vs KrisFlyer UOB (3 mpd uncapped vs 2 mpd) and higher fee (S$397.85 vs S$196.20).

AMEX KF Ascend benefits: Complimentary 1-night Hilton stay + Hilton Silver status, Fast-track to KrisFlyer Elite Gold (S$16,000 SIA spend in first 6 months), 30,000 miles referral bonus (up to 3/year). Welcome bonus: up to 34,800 miles (new-to-AmEx + S$1,000 spend).

Maybank Horizon earns: 2.8 mpd on air tickets (uncapped, S$10K monthly cap for ticket bonus category), 1.2 mpd base on other transactions, variable rates on travel-related categories. Travel-focused card. Transfer to KrisFlyer at 2.5 points = 1 mile (fee S$27.25).
Maybank Horizon MCCs: 4511 (airlines - focus), 4722 (travel agencies), 7011 (hotels), 7033 (camping), 5542 (petrol) variable. Best for direct airline ticket purchases (4511 MCC).
DBS Altitude earns: 1.3 mpd local spending, 2.2 mpd foreign currency (FCY). General spending card (no category bonuses). Transfer to KrisFlyer and 3+ airline partners. Welcome: 28,000 bonus miles.
DBS Altitude: Flexible transfer to KrisFlyer, Asia Miles, Cathay Pacific, ANA. Transfer fee S$27.25. Useful as backup/overflow for general spending when other category cards maxed.

SC Journey earns: 3 mpd on online groceries (5411), food delivery (5499), public transport (4111); 1.2 mpd local base, 2 mpd FCY. Niche categories but useful for specific spend. Transfer to KrisFlyer and 10+ partners. No annual fee available.
SC Journey MCCs: 5411 (groceries - online), 5499 (food delivery/misc food), 4111 (public transport). These specifically earn 3 mpd vs standard 1.2 mpd.

Citi Premier Miles earns: 1.2 mpd local, 2.2 mpd FCY. General spending card. ADVANTAGE: Non-expiring miles (no expiry). Transfer to 11 airline programs (KrisFlyer, Asia Miles, Qatar, ANA, etc.). Great for flexible earning with no expiry worry.
Citi Premier Miles: CRITICAL ADVANTAGE - Miles NEVER EXPIRE. No cycle-based expiry like Citi Rewards. Accumulate indefinitely. Better for long-term strategic point holding.

UOB PRVI earns: 1.4 mpd local, 2.4 mpd FCY, 6 mpd on Agoda & Expedia (online travel). Transfer to KrisFlyer, Asia Miles. Useful for travel booking focus (Agoda/Expedia boost). No annual fee waiver (must be paid).
UOB PRVI MCCs: 6010 (Agoda online travel), 4511 (Expedia direct bookings), plus general travel MCCs at standard rates.

AMEX HighFlyer earns: 1.2 mpd general, 2 mpd on SIA Group (SIA, Scoot, KrisShop), bonus dependent on account status (up to 8 mpd with elite status). Direct conversion to KrisFlyer 1:1 (no fee). Very high annual fee vs earning potential. Business-oriented.

AMEX HighFlyer: Recent nerfs (Mar 2023 onwards): Reduced earn rates, capped earning on selected spending, expensive annual fee (S$400). Now much less attractive than KrisFlyer UOB (3 mpd uncapped, lower fee).

Online Shopping MCCs: 5311 (Department Stores - Lazada, Taobao, Daiso), 5399 (General Merchandise - Shopee, Qoo10), 5999 (Specialty Retail - Amazon.sg, Atome). All earn 4 mpd on cards like DBS WWBC, Citi Rewards, HSBC Revolution within caps.
